column2: "Far too many ARKS members neglect to make use of visiphones. We can't encourage that kind of Luddite behavior, if you ask me."
"Visiphones are so useful, whether you want to chat with friends, buy and sell things, and so on. And if you don't have friends yet, go make some!"
"So what about you? You should go try using a visiphone while we're on the subject. Do it."
"Do what? Go use a visiphone! Haven't you been listening? You'd best pay attention."
"Well, what are you waiting for? It's not rocket science. Now go put my mind at ease, all right?"
